verses.verse: Let him <S%H5401>kiss<s%> me with the <S%H5390>kisses<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; For thy <S%H1730>love<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H3196>wine<s%>.

Thine <S%H8081>oils<s%> have a <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H7381>fragrance<s%>; Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> is as <S%H8081>oil<s%> poured <S%H7324>forth<s%>; Therefore do the <S%H5959>virgins<s%> love <S%H157>thee<s%>.

Draw <S%H4900><s%> <S%H7323>me<s%>; we will run <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4428>thee<s%>: The king hath <S%H935>brought<s%> me into his <S%H2315>chambers<s%>; We will be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H2142>thee<s%>; We will make mention of thy <S%H1730>love<s%> more than of <S%H3196>wine<s%>: <S%H4339>Rightly<s%> do they love <S%H157>thee<s%>.

I am <S%H7838>black<s%>, but <S%H5000>comely<s%>, Oh ye <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, As the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>, As the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.

Look <S%H7200><s%> not upon <S%H7840>me<s%>, because I am swarthy, Because the <S%H8121>sun<s%> hath <S%H7805>scorched<s%> <S%H517>me<s%>. My mother's <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H2787>incensed<s%> against <S%H7760>me<s%>; They made me <S%H5201>keeper<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>; But mine own <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> have I not <S%H5201>kept<s%>.

Tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H5315>me<s%>, O thou whom my soul <S%H157>loveth<s%>, <S%H349>Where<s%> thou <S%H7462>feedest<s%> thy <S%H349>flock<s%>, Where thou makest it to <S%H7257>rest<s%> at <S%H6672>noon<s%>: <S%H4100>For<s%> why should I be as one that is veiled Beside the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of thy <S%H2270>companions<s%>?

If thou <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3303>not<s%>, O thou fairest among <S%H802>women<s%>, Go thy way <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, And <S%H7462>feed<s%> thy <S%H1429>kids<s%> beside the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>' <S%H4908>tents<s%>.
I have <S%H1819>compared<s%> <S%H7474>thee<s%>, O my love, To a <S%H5484>steed<s%> in <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H7393>chariots<s%>.
Thy <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> are <S%H4998>comely<s%> with <S%H8447>plaits<s%> of <S%H6677>hair<s%>, Thy neck with strings of <S%H2737>jewels<s%>.
We will <S%H6213>make<s%> thee <S%H8447>plaits<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> With <S%H5351>studs<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.
While the <S%H4428>king<s%> sat at his <S%H4524>table<s%>, My <S%H5373>spikenard<s%> sent <S%H5414>forth<s%> its <S%H7381>fragrance<s%>.
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is unto me as a <S%H6872>bundle<s%> of <S%H4753>myrrh<s%>, That <S%H3885>lieth<s%> betwixt my <S%H7699>breasts<s%>.
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is unto me as a <S%H811>cluster<s%> of <S%H3724>henna-flowers<s%> In the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> of <S%H5872>En-gedi<s%>.
Behold <S%H3303><s%>, thou art fair, my <S%H7474>love<s%>; Behold thou art <S%H3303>fair<s%>; Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are as <S%H3123>doves<s%>.
Behold <S%H3303><s%>, thou art fair, my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>, <S%H5273>yea<s%>, pleasant: Also our <S%H6210>couch<s%> is <S%H7488>green<s%>.
The <S%H6982>beams<s%> of our <S%H1004>house<s%> are <S%H730>cedars<s%>, And our <S%H7351>rafters<s%> are <S%H1266>firs<s%>.
